label: uncl3479
comment: Code specifying the marital status of a person.

values.label: Unmarried and never been married
values.comment: Person is unmarried and has never been married.

values.label: Unmarried and been married before
values.comment: Person is unmarried but has been married before.

values.label: Separated
values.comment: Person is still married but living apart from spouse.

values.label: Widow or widower
values.comment: Person is a widow or widower.
